items.name: Liana E.
items.text: Amazing service! Picked up in 25 minutes, returned in 3 hours. Clothes smell fresh, everything perfectly ironed. Now ordering every week.

items.name: Maria G.
items.text: Best solution for saving time. The app is very simple — order takes 2 minutes. Couriers are always polite and punctual.

items.name: James R.
items.text: Very careful with my delicate items. Silk shirts came back like new. Excellent customer service — answered all my questions.

items.name: Sophia K.
items.text: Fast, professional and fair price. Save 5+ hours every week. Now I have more time for family and hobbies. Highly recommend!

items.name: David L.
items.text: Super simple app and flawless service. Real-time courier tracking — very convenient. Transparent prices, no hidden charges.

items.question: How does Lotti service work?
items.answer: 1) Download the app and place your order in 2 minutes. 2) Courier arrives within 30 minutes and picks up your laundry. 3) We professionally wash your clothes. 4) In 3 hours courier returns clean and ironed laundry. Track order status in real-time.

items.question: How much does delivery cost?
items.answer: Delivery is completely free for orders from 3 kg. For orders under 3 kg — €2.99. No extra charges for urgency, weekends or holidays.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), Apple Pay, Google Pay and Bizum. Cash payment to courier is also available.

items.question: How fast do you pick up clothes?
items.answer: We strive to pick up your clothes within 30 minutes after placing the order. In 94% of cases the courier arrives in 20-25 minutes. You can track courier's location in real-time in the app.

items.question: What if clothes get damaged?
items.answer: All clothes are 100% insured. If damage occurred due to our fault, we compensate full market value of the item within 48 hours. In 3 years of operation the damage rate is less than 0.1%.

items.question: Can I cancel an order?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel the order for free until the courier picks up your clothes. After pickup the standard service cost applies. Cancellation is done in 1 click in the app.

items.question: Do you work on weekends and holidays?
items.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM, including all holidays. No extra charges for weekends and holidays.

items.question: What detergents do you use for washing?
items.answer: We use only professional premium hypoallergenic detergents. They are safe for sensitive skin and suitable for children's clothing. Eco-friendly detergents without chemical additives available upon request.

finalCta.title: Ready to Get Back 4+ Hours Every Week?
finalCta.subtitle: Download the app and get 30% off your first order. No card registration required

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Lotti we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with GDPR.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: At Lotti we collect the following personal information when using our services:
items: Full name and contact details (email address, phone number)

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the collected information to:
items: Process and manage your laundry orders
Communicate with you about order status
Improve our services and user experience
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

section3.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
section3.intro: We process your personal data under the following legal bases:
section3.consent: Consent: For marketing communications and optional cookies
section3.contract: Contract performance: To provide requested services
section3.legitimate: Legitimate interest: To improve our services and prevent fraud
section3.legal: Legal obligation: To comply with legal and tax requirements

section4.title: 4. Sharing Information with Third Parties
section4.intro: We may share your information with:
section4.providers: Service providers: Payment processors, delivery services, hosting
section4.partners: Logistics partners: To coordinate pickup and delivery
section4.noSale: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.intro: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:
items: Limited access only for authorized personnel

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
section6.access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
section6.rectification: Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
section6.erasure: Erasure: Request deletion of your data
section6.restriction: Restriction: Limit processing of your data
section6.portability: Portability: Obtain your data in structured format
section6.objection: Objection: Object to processing of your data
section6.contact: To exercise these rights contact us: privacy@lotti.com

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.intro: We retain your personal information only for the necessary time:
section7.account: Account data: While your account is active
section7.marketing: Marketing data: Until you withdraw your consent
section7.cookies: Cookie data: According to our Cookie Policy

section8.title: 8. International Transfers
section8.intro: Your data may be transferred outside the EEA with appropriate safeguards:

section9.title: 9. Minors
section9.content: We do not intentionally collect information from persons under 18 years old.

section10.title: 10. Cookies
section10.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. See our

section11.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
section11.content: We may periodically update this policy. We will notify you of substantial changes by email 30 days before the changes take effect.

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.intro: For questions about this policy contact us:
section12.complaint: You can file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD): www.aepd.es
